message.content:
cs.CR, cs.SY, cs.CY, cs.SE, cs.DC 

The paper discusses the cyber security issues in a smart grid environment, which involves the integration of cyber systems with the physical power system. Therefore, the most likely arXiv CS sub-category is cs.CR (Cryptography and Security). The paper also discusses the requirements and state of the art of cyber security issues of a critical power system infrastructure, which falls under the sub-category cs.SY (Systems and Control). Additionally, the paper discusses the integration of cyber systems with the physical power system, which falls under the sub-category cs.CY (Computers and Society). The paper also discusses the operational failures and loss of synchronization due to cyber-attacks, which falls under the sub-category cs.SE (Software Engineering). Finally, the paper discusses the modernization of the electric power infrastructure, which involves the incorporation of current and future requirements and advanced functionalities, which falls under the sub-category cs.DC (Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing).
